Perceptor::

Percerptor's wound had healed. Cr's alarm rang, that meant that 
Perceptor was ready to left the Cr.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., ragnus_@h... wrote:
> OOC: Sorry I've been so long in posting...
> 
> BIC:
> >Megatron after seeing most of his troops enter decided to follow 
> >suit, he neared the repair bays, and noticed Ragnus for the first 
> >time. His face turned to a look of suprise, "Who, Who are you?" he 
> >asked, curious of this robot.
> 
> Ragnus looked down at the questioning 'bot, "I am Ragnus."  Looking 
> at him again, he recognized this robot as the one he saw when he 
> called up the faction's leader on the terminal earlier.  "And I am 
> here to offer my services as a warrior and a tactitian."
> 
> Pointing towards the CR chamber that held Perceptor, "I know not 
what 
> faction this 'bot is in, but I give him to you.  Do with him what 
you 
> wish..."
